item.description:
Head to Head Communication happens through words,
Heart to Heart communication happens through music,
Soul to Soul communication happens in silence.

Get a glimpse of all these three communications at the Bhakti Kirtan. An evening full of Scintillating music and Chants that will refresh your insides .
Jazz music in harmony with ancient Sanskrit songs resulting in a wonderful treat for the body , mind and soul.
Bhakti has played everywhere from New York’s Town Hall and Lincoln Center to the United Nations and Jakkur Airfield in Bangalore, India in front of a crowd of millions. All band members actively volunteer on community service projects and use their music to help harmonize, heal and uplift the people around them.
So Come and experience a blissful evening of meditative singing with the company of truth.

Venue:MIT Chapel
Address:48 Massachusetts Avenue(Rear)
Cambridge,MA-02139
Time:7 pm to 9 pm
Date:17th march 2012
BUY YOUR TICKETS NOW, $15 online, $20 at the door
For further information, contact 302-569-2972 or781-308-2502
item.name: Bhakti - A Journey Into Chants and Fusion
